title: what wards do ward skins change?
body: straight forward questions, I'm aware they change vision and stealth wards and not the farsight or sweeping lens, but what about sightstone, and all the sup items built off from the sightstone? and to clarify if it's different from each type of skin, I'm talking about standard 640rp ward skins.

replies.body: Anything to do with wards, Sightstone, trinkets, blue trinket anything to do with a vision ward or pink ward is going to change depending on what skin you have on
